mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CUSTOMER WHERE phone=#{phone} and completion=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER (idx,phone,menu,flavor,completion,register_date) VALUES (CUSTOMER_SEQUENCE.nextval,#{phone},#{menu},#{flavor},0,(select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm') from dual))
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOMER set COMPLETION=1, complete_date=(select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm') from dual) where phone=#{phone} and completion=0
mapper.delete: delete CUSTOMER where phone=#{phone} and completion=0
mapper.update: update customer set menu=#{menu}, flavor=#{flavor} where phone=#{phone} and completion=0
mapper.select: select count(*) from customer where completion=0
